definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
every beginning is difficult (idiom)/getting started is always the hardest part

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對克拉麗莎來說，主菜只是是個開頭。

sentences.english: I am Alpha and omega. the beginning and the end. the first and the last.
sentences.chinese: 這個小說的開頭讓我想起了異度裝甲。

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: Each good thing is hard to begin.
Later, Gongxing Lun at the beginning of a long self-study and examination, a full 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 後來，龔興倫開頭了漫長的自學和考試，整整7年。

sentences.english: Assignment activities used for setup begin with a lowercase letter.
sentences.chinese: 用於設置的分配活動則以小寫字母開頭。

sentences.english: The poem employs as its first lines a verse plagiarized from a billboard .
sentences.chinese: 這首詩開頭的幾行抄襲了一個廣告牌上的一節詩。

sentences.english: Add the left brace that marks the beginning of the function body.
sentences.chinese: 添加標記函數體開頭的左大括號。

sentences.english: Cover songs are nice, but nothing beats the original.
sentences.chinese: 開頭曲是唱得不錯，不過跟本尊還是沒得比。

sentences.english: Their first subject was the diminution of the Rosings party.
sentences.chinese: 他們一開頭就談到羅新斯貴賓離開的問題。

sentences.english: And this is the way The Acts of Apostles begins.
sentences.chinese: 這就是使徒行傳的開頭。

sentences.english: Just a small question for us to start with.
sentences.chinese: 就當是開頭的一個小問題吧。

sentences.english: The chapters that comprise the first part of the novel are especially good.
sentences.chinese: 構成那部小說開頭部分的幾章特別好。

sentences.english: The above example jumps back to the beginning of a file. If you don't want to go back quite all the way -- let's say a kilobyte into it -- then you just write
sentences.chinese: 以上示例將跳轉回文件的開頭。

sentences.english: Disaffection broke out almost from the start.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎一開頭就爆發出不滿情緒。

sentences.english: The preamble and epilogue provide standard setup.
sentences.chinese: 開頭和結尾提供標準的設置。

definition: to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
